issue.title: [CF 1092] Totem HP for Bar Layout
issue.body:
For a Brewmaster it might be interesting to Monitor the curent Health of the "Black Ox Statue".

It would also be very nice if the Bar fillstatus, which normaly monitors the duration, could be changed to health percentage of the totem instead.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ikxi111 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1092 | Raw

comments.body:
This isn't possible - there's no API for totem health.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
